dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.overview_intro: Here's an overview of your store.
dashboard.orders_overview_desc: Monthly orders for the current year

footer.store_description: Your one-stop destination for trendy and high-quality fashion products.

hero_subtitle_long: Our platform combines powerful tools, seamless user experience, and cutting-edge technology to help you build and grow your online business.
benefits_subtitle: Our platform provides everything you need to succeed in the competitive e-commerce landscape.
increased_conversion_rates_desc: Optimize your checkout process and UI to boost sales and reduce cart abandonment.
secure_payment_processing_desc: Industry-leading security measures to protect customer data and transactions.
streamlined_shipping_desc: Automated shipping solutions that save time and reduce fulfillment errors.
customer_support_desc: 24/7 dedicated support to help you and your customers resolve issues quickly.
how_it_works_subtitle: Get your online store up and running in four easy steps.
create_your_store_desc: Set up your profile with our intuitive dashboard in minutes.
add_your_products_desc: Add products, see prices, and organize your catalog efficiently.
configure_settings_desc: Customize payment methods, shipping options, and tax settings.
launch_and_grow_desc: Buy store and use our tools to expand your experience.
features_subtitle: Everything you need to create, manage, and grow your online store.
seamless_checkout_desc_long: Optimize conversion with our streamlined, mobile-friendly checkout process.
global_reach_desc_long: Sell to customers worldwide with multi-currency and language support.
secure_payments_desc_long: Accept payments securely with our PCI-compliant gateway integrations.
mobile_optimized_desc_long: Responsive design ensures perfect display on all devices and screen sizes.
lightning_fast_desc_long: Optimized performance and fast loading times improve customer experience.
customizable_desc_long: Flexible templates and design options to match your brand identity.
everything_to_succeed_desc: Our platform provides powerful tools to help you manage your store effectively.
product_management_desc: Easily add, edit, and organize your product catalog with powerful tools.
custom_storefronts_desc: Create beautiful, branded shopping experiences that convert visitors to customers.
marketing_tools_desc: Built-in SEO, email marketing, and social media integration to grow your business.
analytics_dashboard_desc: Comprehensive insights to track performance and make data-driven decisions.
testimonials_subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear what our customers have to say.
testimonial_1: Switching to this platform was the best business decision I've made. My sales have increased by 40% in just three months!
testimonial_2: The analytics tools helped me understand my customers better. Now I can offer exactly what they want, when they want it.
testimonial_3: As a small business owner, I needed something affordable yet powerful. This platform delivered beyond my expectations.
pricing_plans_launch_desc: Choose the perfect plan for your business needs. Special launch pricing available for early adopters.
starter_desc_long: Perfect for small businesses just getting started with e-commerce.
professional_desc_long: Ideal for growing businesses looking to scale their online presence.
enterprise_desc_long: Custom solutions for large businesses with high-volume sales.
pricing_notification_desc: Get notified when our pricing plans become available and receive exclusive early access offers.
email_privacy_note: We respect your privacy and will never share your information.
cta_description_long: Join thousands of users already using our platform to grow their online presence.
footer_about: We provide powerful e-commerce solutions that help businesses of all sizes sell online and grow their customer base.
